The stay at this hotel was so good that it most certainly warrants a review. Everything about this place was really great. Location was excellent. Room was amazingly clean , comfortable and bright. But the staff at sarovar were even better. Everyone here needs a special mention. Right from the check in to the buffet breakfast to check out every one was very warm, friendly and helpful. Food was really yummy. Room service was great too. View from the terrace near the pool was breathtaking. Definitely staying again at Davanam. Highly recommended !

Having stayed in 2 of Sarovar Portico properties earlier, I was quite excited to see what does Davanam have to offer. The drive to the airport was uncomfortably long as you would expect from most hotels in Bengaluru. To be precise, it took about 51km from airport even though the airport is in Koramangala.

What's good?
We ended up conducting two of our meetings right inside the hotel lobby as it has sufficient space for the meetings to be conducted and most people are aware of the hotel location.

The room we were allocated had a separate working area and was very well spaced out.

The staff was very courteous including those at the restaurant.

What could have been better?
The Wi-Fi speed left a lot to be desired, being a business hotel one would expect better and responsive Wi-Fi.

Will I be coming back again?
Certainly for the size of the rooms and the decor.

The hotel is situated in Koramangala and is housed in a mall.
The hotel has huge rooms(read suites) as it is an all suits hotels
There is nothing flashy about the hotel and thats exactly what i loved about this place.
The service was quick and the breakfast was tasty

I have stayed in Sarovar hotels in at least 15 cities in India. Happy to say that I liked this one the most.
One of the top features of this hotel is the room which is like a small suite. It is nicely appointed and spacious. The appointment of the room changed the flavour of the stay.
The staff was very good, very well trained and responsive.
I took dinner and breakfast next morning. Again the food was a notch above the standard fare you get in such hotels.
Only problem is the location. It is far away from everywhere! From my meeting venue in Gandhinagar, Fortune JP celestial, it took one and half hour in the evening.
However, well done Davanam Sarovar.

Rooms are quite big, beautiful, clean, worth every penny.
Hotel is well maintained
Brkfst was extremely delicious and filled with loads of options
The staff were extremely helpful alwwyz ready to help
I highly recommend this hotel if u planning to visit bangalore.

The staff in the reception is very bad. Also the hotel asks for credit card numbers, expiry dates, etc, which is not permitted by the banks to disclose to anybody. So please beware of the credit card fraud which might happen from this hotel.

One of the luxury suites available in the junction of whitefied and electronic city two IT hubs of Bangalore and close to most happening place in the town, Koramangala.
The suites are very tidy and cozy. Ambiance is perfect.

Though the location of the property is bit inconvenient. The traffic around the property is terrible . But on the other hand the Property, Staff, Rooms, Food, Tariffs are very good. Value for money. Had a very comfortable stay.

Bigger rooms. Strategically located. Friendly staff. Lot of good deals at the property.
One mall is just below to grab items needed pronto. Other malls and shopping places nearby. Overall good experience.

I stayed at this hotel from 31.08.2016 to 03.09.2016 and its a superb hotel. very spacious and beautiful room. breakfast is awesome and every day new menu in breakfast is the best thing. hotel staff are very friendly. overall great stay.

Hello, I stayed at this property for 3 days and had an great time. Truly a 4 star hotel!

They have beautifuly designed spacious rooms/suites with all the modren facilites and everything in mint condition. King size bed, sofas, office table, dressing table, cubords, 2 flat screen TV's, clean bathroom, etc... The lobbys are huge, bright and beautiful.

They have 2-3 resturants which are truly comforting. We just loved the food at this hotel, amazing breakfast buffet and the in room dining was great too. Do not forget to taste the south indian food, i feel they have the best south indian chef.

The swiming pool is on the top floor (8th) and found it to be decent with great view of banglore. They have a conference hall right next to the pool so privicy is something which the guests might have to put up with if in case there is a conference going on by non hotel staying guests. When i say conference - large number of people in formals talking serious business and we in swiming suites happily swiming. Quite a contrast... We enjoyed though ;)

They have a spa on the 7th floor and i found the interiors and the message room to be ok, but the service and the pricing was good.

The location of the hotel is on a real busy highway and near to the famous traffic jam hotspot 'silk board junction'. So getting to this place and going out on a rush hour traffic is quite tricky. The hotel is in a small mall and it starts from 4th floor. You have Mc Donalds, KFC and other eatries on the ground floor along with few other shopping options up until 3 floors and then the hotel starts. The entry and exit to the hotel is quite narrow and the parking in the basement is general parking for all since its in the mall premises.

And now the staff!! They were amazing.. Quick check in, speedy room service, energetic and always greeting you with a smile and ready to help/serve you for all your needs.

Overall the busy location should not take away even half star as in every other aspect its totaly worth every penny. I am looking forward to stay at DSPS again.

Thank you.

I have stayed here 2nd time, great location, good food, nice helping staff.

Rooms are really large, you can do a small meeting/get-together in room itself.

Everything was good at hotel. Good for families as well as business travelers equally

I had an amazing stay at the hotel. The suites are very luxurious and good to stay. The thing I liked most about this hotel is the hospitality. The whole staff is very cooperative and polite. Food is super awesome.

Not many apartment style hotels are seen nowadays and Davanam Sarovar or Grand Mercure in Bangalore are exceptions.

Nothing new that other reviewers have not covered ... massive rooms and depending on which room one gets, there is always something different for example, this time I had a walkin wardrobe. Their internet service has really improved and no complaints on that front.

Housekeeping and hospitality continue to be top notch. Room service is tasty and not very expensive as well. The breakfast buffet beats Grand Mercure as well.

Wish they could do something about the room lighting as it is dimly lit for such a massive room size. Also water pressure in the bathroom could be a bit of hit or miss.

Service is very good.
Room is excellent.
Prime location beside More mega mart and have all the services.
Food is really nice.
WiFI good i never faced any issues.
Room maintenance is perfect they attended when i am not at the room an placed the things back to their location perfectly.

Stayed there for a week. Well let me list down USPs of this hotel:

A) Room size ... Massive .. It's a suite guys.
B) breakfast layout ..great.
C) F&B staff and team. Just awsum .. Interactive, always eager to assist. Forgetting names of team members but really, hats off to them.
D) Price in restaurant. Affordable.
E) Japanese cuisine - delicious
F) Affordability in terms of price of room .. Oops sorry .. Suite.

If you intend to stay in or near Kormangala, this is the place ... thumbs up to Davanam Sarovar Portico

Excellent Hotel with amenities. Located near/ on the way to electronic city hence very good location for people having work near to these place.

They have good restaurants to take care of your choice of food.

My friends and I came to Bangalore from a variety of countries for a wedding and needed somewhere close to the venues. The location was excellent. The staff were fantastic, always so helpful and friendly. We loved our rooms, they were so spacious, clean and well set out. The furniture was comfortable and ideal for when we were all gathering in one room after dinner or when getting ready for going to the wedding events. The breakfast buffet was excellent, plenty of options and a huge variety of food and drinks. The restaurant staff were always welcoming and helpful. The room amenities such as the tea and shampoo were very handy. Room service was delicious and prompt. The free wifi all over the hotel was very good.

There were two lovely women from the hotel staff who helped us drape our saris for the wedding who were brilliant. We would not have been able to manage without them! They did such a great job and we received many complements on how the saris looked.

My main and only small concern was the lack of microwave and glassware in the room. The small kitchen was very impressive but seemed a bit pointless without some form of method to cook or heat up food. Also, when ordering taxis, especially for the airport, the differences between the regular taxis and the hotel car/taxi should be explained in terms of reliability of showing up when ordered and cost. My friend was a bit tense when we were still waiting for a taxi to show up 30 minutes after we had requested it to arrive, despite booking it that morning and confirming the booking a number of times during the day. The traffic was worse than expected and it was very close to missing the flight. Having said that, the hotel was also brilliant when another friend realised at the airport that she left her passport in the hotel safe and the hotel was able to arrange a car to take her passport to the airport to meet her, just in time for her flight back to London. We were so grateful!

Overall, it was an excellent stay and we had a fantastic time. I highly recommend this hotel.

It is INDEED a very unique title for this review. It comes from someone who has stayed there more that 12-15 occasions in the last few months. I shall reveal the context in midst of the review

Those who don't know Bengaluru well a bit background about the location. This hotel is part of the Total Mall which is next to Madiwala Police Station/Madiwala Market. Madiwala is just half a kilometer or so from Forum Mall Kormangala. The landscape around Madiwala is far different from that of Kormangala. Madiwala is a busy junction mainly inhabited by migrant families from neighbouring Tamil Nadu. They have been there since more than 30 years plus and hence it has its own characteristic landscape whereas Kormangala has developed fast in the last 10-15 years. 20 years back it was considered outskirts of Bengaluru.

The hotel is part of the total mall and it looks a massive structure while you approach it from Electronic city and as you come closer you will be shocked with very small driveway. Ground floor is just the travel desk the lobby is on the fourth floor. The lobby is another shocker as it has very weird ceiling which makes it feel more low that what it is and very claustrophobic. It is huge with ample seating. One side is the reception desk, the ONLY restaurant and bar opposite side and either side are banquets and exec offices and NO Natural Lighting. The best part of the lobby and restaurant entrance are the Bronze Traditional Figurines n Traditional Cotton wick lamps.

The check in always has bugged me as they have never acknowledge my repeat visits but the worst part being their security scan of Govt Id's. They have also insisted that the picture be taken with the web cam which is only unique to this place. This they have done once or twice with my permission and twice I have caught their staff do the same discreetly without my knowledge which I found it to be Fishy.

Its an all suites hotel with atrium. Half of the rooms face the Atrium which is MALL. And the Atrium is huge and in one of the floors or all of the three floors it is not a full rectangle. i.e. if you were allotted a room at the far end which is the dead end you will have to walk all the three lengths of the atrium and mind you its a long walk, hence First Tip - Ask for a room near the elevators for two reasons to avoid the long walks and secondly this is only place where you have french windows which brings in Natural Light.

Most of the rooms are huge with kitchenette, seating area and Sleeping area/Bed room. In some rooms there is walkin ward robe and or Dining Table. There is only one washroom though which is connected from Seating and Bed. Since I have stayed on many occasions the rooms are not standard sizes, they are huge but the dimensions vary. There are few rooms (near the elevator of course) are like junior suites bit of seating area and bed. The only thing common in all the rooms is the huge floor lamp, the picture frame of Yellow Tulips and one most common thing is the Frame of "Golden Nested Eggs" right above the pot in the washrooms.

Almost all the rooms windows - Atrium facing or road are very small. Considering the overall size of the room and small windows gives a feeling of sitting in a Golden CAGE more so if you are in a Atrium facing rooms you CANNOT afford to open your curtains as you will have another room facing you and the Mall ofcourse. Irrespective of the facing the nights could be noisy either due to the Traffic of busy highway below or the night/early morning cleaning at the mall.

The washrooms are good with shower stall, soap dispenser for handwash, etc but the bath soap which they give in bar form is floral scented and huge. Total put off and waste. some one staying for a night would waste the bar either due its sheer size if not surely due its floral fragrance....imagine a man smelling all floral after a shower. I did raise this up many times but no changes there.

The restaurant is huge and has equally huge sofas which are too comfortable and heavy to move. There are very few standard chairs except for the far corner which looks quite deserted. The bar is quite sad especially with Cocktails I had a classical cocktail which is supposed to come in a whisky glass or roly poly, it came in a Champagne Saucer looking and tasting something else only.

The buffet spread for breakfast and dinner is very good with live counters for Pasta during dinners, Omelette-Pancakes-waffles for breakfast. South Indian is finger licking good and Biryani which is part of daily dinner fare is worth a try. Service too has improved over a period of time to being very quick and efficient. There was a point when it was pathetic but I have seen a see change quickly.

Ohh yes there is roof top which has pool and banquets. It offers birds eye view of the landscape of the vicinity. Good place to chill in evenings provided there is no event in the hall close by.

They offer free WiFi which earlier was very high speed, the last few stays it has been decent not like before.

This place is surely worth staying for its large rooms and good food just excuse the view

It was nice overall. Only glitch was Wi-fi speed. The room was amazing with a wonderful city view. The ventilation was great with natural light filling up the room. The service was commendable too. So I hope to visit again.

Just in town from Hyderabad one night. Off to meetings in the morning. Hotel is insanely great. I was upgraded to an executive suite for free. Spectacular rooms. Staff are friendly yet extremely professional. Restaurant was great for dinner, then a business meeting. Breakfast has great selection: Indian food, American food, omelette bar, fruits, and really good, strong, fresh ground/brewed coffee.
Staff are so good. Especially Sonu in the restaurant. She made me feel at home, a long way from home.

Best hotel in the area. smooth check in specious room .good & quality furniture & interior room good various delirious complementary breakfast . nice lobby, better room services , beautiful roof top swimming pool . nice experience .

The rooms are very large, probably 70 m2 with own kitchen, the staff is really great, restaurant, and bar all good. The only thing is that it's next to a busy street so it can be noisy. Overall I would highly recommend this place for business travel.

Very Poor hospitality espically fornt desk staff there behaviour was like a Dhaba hotel This was my first Stay at Saravour Portico Property if it is there attitued every where then i feel they are not greared to handle business travellers. i will think thousand times before staying here even if offered a free stay

very nice rooms. located right next to a shopping mall. service by hotel staff exceeded expectations. the property doesn't seem like one that opened in 2004. it's maintained very well. the buffet spread was really good. nothing to complain about the property.

Rooms are very nice and is very well located if your office is in the middle of the city. Due to the pressing work I was unable to check out their breakfast but I am sure it would be good.
Staff is very friendly and helpful. Two AC zones in the room gives you the comfort of maintaining different temperatures in living and sleeping area. Six seater sofa and 2 bar stools lets you invite your business guests in your room itself.
Good food too. I tried Italian and continental cousine both were good.
Because it is part of a Mall, shopping is never too far..don't expect to get the luxury brands or great nightclubs though.

Visited with family for vacations. Easy check Inn . Upgraded rooms even without asking. Room with drawing & kitchen with modren interior impressed us . Wide spread buffet was also delicious. I will give 5 out of 5 to this hotel

We had a training arranged here from 11 through 14 June facilitated through GRT Consulting.

Overall, we had an optimal experience barring a restaurant fiasco where the food was sub-optimal. The facilities offered for the training, along with the snacks were stupendous. A great deal of improvement needs to be made in ambience.

I stayed twice in this hotel and very satisfied with the services. The rooms are just amazing. The hotel is situated at centralized location and have a mall attached to it. The room service and hotel staff are very nice.

Food is awesome. They offer a nice variety of breakfast. Being solo traveler, I was little afraid initially. But after my first visit I was confident that the place is safe to stay in for solo traveller's esp Females.

Thank you for such a wonderful hospitality !!

Stayed in the executive suite for 4n 5d. The suite was extremely spacious with all modern amenities. I must appreciate the house keeping staff for maintaining the rooms since they were so clean. There was a light not working in my room and the technician fixed it within 5 minutes of making a call. Now that's called amazing service. Be it room service, in room dinning, wifi access, the service was absolutely within minutes. Also, I had ordered food from outside and the hotel not only allowed it but also provided with empty plates and cutlery. Would also like to mention special thanks to one of the housekeeping staff (I don't know his name) who arranged for a vase in my room to keep the bouquet of flowers I had received from my client. That was done during the room clean up when I was out and was a pleasant surprise for me. The hotel in room dining food is good and the staff has always been able to provide food within 30 mins of placing order. The buffet spread for breakfast n dinner is good too. Try the pancakes and veg fry wonton. The rooms are split into a working area, sitting area, kitchenette, bedroom and bathroom. 2 televisions - bedroom, Hall. Since I was on a business trip, i could peacefully work in the hall n working area with my office colleagues. The staff is very courteous. Check in and check out was within 5 minutes. No hassles. There is a swimming pool on rooftop with a nice view of the city. The hotel has facility for takeaway breakfast between 5-7 if you need to travel before 7am when the breakfast starts. Rooms face city or inside a mall. It's adjacent to a shopping mall with a supermarket and some factory outlets. Overall a good place to stay.

I stayed in this hotel for one day. The rooms will actually make you feel that you are living in five star hotel. The rooms are spacious, neat and clean. The hotel is located in the center of the city because of which traffic jams usually occur near the hotel. Adjacent to this hotel is a supermarket. Overall this is a very good hotel to stay.

the rooms are very spacious with all the amenities and and as the name suggest the rooms are suite type very big and spacious with 2 tv dinning and kitchen space
the house keeping service is also very prompt. They have all the amenities, You name it and they have. The Buffet Break Fast spread is very good. And staff is also very helpful. The recetion staff specially Deepti ( if I remember it correctly is very jovial andhelpful. Infact all the staff receive and serve you with a BIG SMILE. Doube the vaule of money. This was my third stay in last 10 months

This hotel is in the heart of the city. Just next to it is a large super market with Mc Donalds. Rooms are very spacious with living area and kitchen. The breakfast spread is also good. This property also has its own roof top swimming pool and gym.

I booked the place through an online service and the staff is also very warm and courteous.

Hotel is located in prime place and nearby there are lot of shops and Mall.
Spacious and clean room, good buffet break fast menu. Prime location.
Co operative staff. Good ambience at Tangerine restaurant.

Stayed at DSPS for 2 Nights, everything was fantastic, size of suites, food, service, cleanliness.

Entrance view is in contradiction to the inside space for this property, really loved staying.

Would stay again.

Had gone for a business visit for two nights and little taken aback on seeing the location and entrance of the hotel.

Check in was nice and quick but rooms was great. The rooms were big spacious comfortable, clean . The bed and air conditioning was great. The room overlooked a busy street so was very noisy even at night , but was so tired that it hardly bothered me. For light sleepers it will be a problem

Had 4 meals in the hotel and all very below expectations.

Dinner Buffet : Service was nice and staff courteous , but all food was served cold and some dishes tasted stale.Though some dishes were cooked well but serving them cold spoilt the taste. The deserts were horrific and should be avoided

Breakfast : 2 days: It was a regular breakfast as in any hotel but for the fact the fruits were not good, cold milk not cold, breads and cakes hard and stale. They even had two items from last night dinner buffet leftover in the bearkfast

Dinner : It was the worst meal. We ordered soups and out of 8 available in the menu only two were available( that also from buffet) even they were not served hot. We ordered for some beer that was given in the menu and they had just one brand out of 10 listed. I donot understand the reason for having large menus when you actually dont want to serve it
On ordering a main course dish fish in lemon butter sauce, we were surprised to see that 4 pcs of fish being sent on our table without any sauce, salads, vegetables inspite of that being mentioned in the menu. On calling the waiter we were told that this is the way that the dish is served. When asked to see the menu and called the chef and the manager did they agree to change the dish and supplied us with salad , bread and sauce.

Room service and house keeping was prompt and commendable. If they could improve on there food part then can be a great place for business traveller

Good hotel with very spacious rooms. I think the best in Bangalore. Was our 4th time staying here. The rooms are well appointed and spacious. The bathrooms are big and clean. The staff is courteous. The food is also good. The buffet spread is also good.

Very good.everything fine except for parking
Food and spread was very good
Will recomend to others
Suites very spacious
Good stay for a family
Room service was prompt
Living area and seating very good

I had stayed here for 2 nights with my family. The room was very spacious and clean. The staffs were friendly and their service was spot on. I liked the breakfast buffet, the spread was gud and tasted yum. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

Huge rooms,the best in size,decent breakfast spread..good courteous staff..the bare minimum any hotels needs to keep a customer happy...liked the stay although the location became a lil headache to access due to traffic..will sure recommend and book again

I stayed at Davanam for 3 days and clearly got impressed with the rooms, cleanliness, food and service. The staff is courteous and prompt. I would highly recommend this hotel to couple of people:

- All husbands who would like to pamper their wives
- All vendors who would like to pamper their angry customers

This was my first stay in a business hotel and I was mind blown. The suit was very spacious having two TVs one in the drawing area and one just comfortably located in front of the bed. the temperature control is very good. The restaurant below is pretty O.K.

I stayed at this property for 3 night during the second week of May, 2016. This hotel is situated at a very convenient location. However, traffic could be a problem, especially during office hours. Rooms were nice, large and well maintained. Everyday, we enjoyed our breakfast in the hotel. There are plenty of things to chose in the breakfast.

Breakfast has great options. Its at an ideal location with Mall attached, we went on shopping and and had Gala time, Cleaning my Car without my knowledge was a WOW factor. Mini-Bar was apt and very moderately priced.
Great Team there would love to visit again.

Ashish Tripathi

For me it is the best hotel in Bangalore and the best place to stay near Koramangala, HSR Layout and Electronic City. The rooms are spacious and it is located above a shopping mall where you can buy everything. I liked the dinner buffet very much because in one week it did not repeat much. Everyday some new specialities. For the breakfast the hotel offers good cheese (which is rare in India). And I found that the croissant are chrunchy and the juices not too sweet (seems not so much sugar added what I personally like very much). The variety and the choice of food is very good. From the roof top I had a really spectacular view over Bangalore but also to relax at the swimming pool. The hotel seems to have a lot of Japanese guests which have a high requirement for cleaniless. Therefore, I can fully recommend that place. I think the place is perfect for long and short stay.

I stayed in this property for a short business trip to bangalore. I chose this hotel, based on the positive reviews and its proximity to electronic city and whitefield.

Location - Good location, on hosur main road , opposite to madiwala police station. It is close to prominent industrial areas and famous forum mall . A few good eating options and bars are within 3 km radius of this property. The hotel shares it's walls with a small mall which houses few shopping options, KFC, mc donalds and mega departmental store (More).

Note - "More" departmental store has a decent collection of wine, IMFL and foreign liquor. People who enjoy evening drinks in the comfort of their rooms must explore this .

Hotel - A typical four star sardaar sarovar property, nicely built and impeccably maintained. A small gym on 5th floor and a decent sized pool on 8th floor can be used for relaxation.
I observed that too much chlorine was used in the pool, making it difficult for swimmers.


Rooms - Huge airy rooms, very practically designed and kept very clean. Comfy couch and ergonomic work bench was very much appreicated. The rooms have well stocked mini bar in a full sized refrigerator.
Decent sized bathrooms with good amenities. The water pressure was a bit low in the shower, no complaints though.

Food- Good food, optimum quantity and quality, acceptable prices for its class. Well spread buffet breakfast with plenty of options for Indians as well as westerners.

Service and staff - Professionally trained and courteous staff.

Overall a very good experience in this property.
Very happy to recommend to friends and members of the forum.

Very spacious rooms, nice and clean. Prompt service, good food quality. Food options available are good too. The location of the hotel is not that great. It is located in a rather busy area and not too much view around. The approach to the hotel was dug up too.
Overall a great place once you are in hotel.

Nice hotel at a good location with good service. I was there for 2 days for a business travel and the stay was pleasant. The rooms are big, food was good. Only small issue I had was that the internet was bit slow and not gets disconnected frequently.

for the price, its a fantastic hotel. the breakfast was amazing, their restaurant was also beautiful...starting from pork sausages to indian food...it offered everything. the rooms are spic and span, the bathrooms are fantastic. total value for money i say1

Last week, we at our company had arranged a national summit for one of our clients and selected Davanam Sarovar Portico Suites for the same. The hotel did perform more than expected. It has a perfect business ambiance and the staff is very well equipped with business etiquette. The banquet hall is quite sophisticated with a robust internet connectivity and projector display. Kudos to Davanam for an amazing arrangement!

The rooms as usual were very big,because of the all suite conformation of the hotel. That said,our room was a corner room facing the mall. There was about 1/4th of a window. That was all the view we had from the room. It was claustrophobic with absolutely no sun light. I asked for a room change but that was turned down. I stayed there for two days and I can't believe another room didn't come free,,because I noticed a lot of rooms were checking out. They just didn't bother despite me asking 4 times. And it was really a very bad room that we got. Whenever you are checking in,please ask them and make sure you don't get a room facing the mall,and if that cannot be helped,atleast get a room that's not in the corner.
Breakfast was great,variety and service was awesome. The restaurant is the highlight of this hotel,always.
Overall would have been a good stay but was severely let down by the jail like windowless room.
I ll include a photo,the curtain covering the supposed Windows? Only they are not Windows. Only half of one of the curtain is enough to cover the only window there. Rest of it is a waste. The room is always this dark and depressing.

This property provides you with whatever you would normally have at your home.
It just doesnt disappoint you the amenities on offer.They have gym facilities along with swimming pool right at the top of the property which gives you an amazing looks of city.

I stayed with my friends who had come from delhi.

The room is adjacent to the Mall, we have suites with refrigerator and alcohol.

Its in a busy area but you will never feel when you are at your couch.

AC rooms for smokers available.

Super rooms , very spacious, very clean and well maintained - good restaurant - overall superb experience !! The interiors are kind of classy and has a very service apartmentish feel.

Recommended if you are in this side of Bangalore (koramangala).

I stayed here with my mum for a wedding. We found the hotel and staff to be super friendly and thankful for the kind lady who helped me and my mum with our sarees. Really liked the wine here. I think it is called grovenor. Convenient for shops and getting into the city is easy too

I have been visiting this hotel for a long time now. The rooms are pretty spacious, well designed and very clean. The staff is very helpful and responsive. The breakfast buffet has a lot of variety and the food is very delicious.

Very nice experience. It feels home to stay here. kitchen and lobby seperate. buffet is also good but there is no eggless items. Room service good and Its located on very busy road near forum mall of b'lore. Due to Traffic chaos, it takes time to and fro everywhere. Visit areas are some distance away. We can book cabs for this or Best is to avail Metro facility for far places as traffic chaos. But this suite is nice. we Definetely stay again here

the hotel is located at madivala a place in bangalore which is near to forum mall the hotel is cosy and have got good rooms with good room service and good staff i took a room for like 5K inr via a hotels booking site online and it was totally worth .... they have a good breakfast menu i think i would definitely stay there if i go again

we had been here for buffet lunch and the food was very tasty especially the chilli fish which was served as a starter overall experience was nice and the price is also less for buffet. Thanks to chef..........

I stayed in a one bedroom suite complete with kitchen, a small sitting room with tv. Bedroom was compact and somehow I felt I am living in a home and not in a hotel. It gave a feeling of comfort which made me happy !!! The decor was good in the room and outside in corridor. Breakfast menu was elaborate and just not the southy fare. Ample parking space and nice front desk staff. Only issue is that the reception is on the seventh floor. I WILL STAY IN THIS PLACE AGAIN!!!!!.

I have traveled to this hotel on a business trip and the hotel was very good and also in prime location. All the rooms are clean and even the breakfast is awesome. Nice pool at the terrace. Worth staying there.

Stayed @ this hotel for 4 nights from 28th January till 1st February 2016.It was a great stay,comfortable very large room with a living area having separate TV, a small kitchenette, although with no appliances,only refrigerator and sink,they do provide a microwave on request, nevertheless a beautiful and luxurious accommodation. only negative was the surrounding area is a vegetables market with some filth around but that is not the properties' fault. Got a great bargain from nearbuy, a subsidiary of makemytrip .

Beautiful rooms,excellent service,good food & a luxury stay.
I would just suggest one improvement - We were expecting a dinner at terrace but couldn't get that service , otherwise would have been a better experience.

Excellent location for travelers, just between madiwala and silk board. The rooms are really big(literally big suites as in the hotel name) and well maintained. The food was excellent and breakfast spread was also good. Room service was quick and overall a excellent place to stay. The property also has a roof top swimming pool.

The hotel room are huge in size and have all basic amenities complimented by a quick service. The only problem is that the approach road in front of the hotel is under construction resulting in difficulty in reaching the place.

Hotel is very convenient location wise. Mall with stores and grocery in one side and fresh market on the other side.Room is like an apt. With a kitchenette and full refrigerator, a living room and a bedroom. Free wifi in the rooms. 2 wide screen tv,
Best part is the free buffet breakfast which I would described as lunch. We ended up not eating lunch and most of the time no dinner. The whole staff were courteous , friendly and helpful. The down side is the market side but I would say it a govt problem

We stayed for 2 nights and was quite satisfied with the room and services. The room was quite bigger than expected. The best thing is that it is built on a mall, so you can shop or eat there.
Breakfast buffet was large enough with hell lot of varieties.

I am not commenting on the stay in this hotel, just about reception.
Yesterday I had been to the hotel after around 9 PM at night.
We had gone there from Kanakpura and we went to enquire about accomodating around 20 people next month.
We were asked to wait by the manager while he attended calls and chitchatted with fellow mates.
Then when finally he acknowledged us he was too brisk and just asked us to send a mail, saying he will reply on mail and was not ready to give approximate quote.
He outrightly refused to show us any room and gave weird expression when we insisted.
We are really disappointed for having travelled so far after office and getting this treatment.
Hope the front desk learns to be courteous.

I have been using this hotel every year since 2012 and they have high standards and an excellent team which are very helpful. For years of staying there, they have an amazing manager Prashant. Hotel room is very spacious.

The last two times i had called before visiting the hotel that i would like if it was possible to get a room that has a view, on the phone the front desk confirmed and noted that it would be so, but at the visit it was said no such information was communicated.( it is so that either I'm lying or they are).

So at the second time i visited i.e 29th aug, due the confrontation with the front desk they gave me a small room which was attached to your suite. that time they had said it won't happen again.

31st dec visit was the worst of all(Thank you for spoiling my newer!!!). At reaching the hotel the front desk manager was least interested in solving my problem, after a prolong argument which they said that no call was done by me and no information was conveyed. It took you hotel 2 hours to give me room. The first room had two single beds, with a request of a single bed, this room dint even have its AC working. After been shifted to the second room, it dint have a fridge, no telephone, no hair dryer.

And worst of all was the conversation with your front desk, he stated that the rooms which we are giving you are a upgrade, i would like to say two things firstly ever time i have stayed at your place i have been given a different room, and secondly the pictures online and what your front desk explain and said about the room types is totally misleading.

We had awesome stay at Davanam Sarovar. Hotel rooms were excellent and very spacious. The food offered was excellent and the services of the staff members was also wonderful. We are glad to have choosen this hotel for our stay in Bangalore. We will surely recommend and will stay again if we get opportunity.

This is undoubtedly my best hotel stay so far. I fell in love with the room the minute I entered it. The building is huge, the interiors are very soothing and staff is courteous and helpful. The food is also great. I highly recommend this for family and couples. I couldn't find a single fkaw with this place. Loved it. Will visit again.

I landed at this hotel by chance: We had been travelling all day- from Chennai to Bangalore and inside Bangalore, when I go hit with low sugar. Checked out the nearest affrodable hotel, and found this within 4 KM. Did not want to blow up 10K on a overnight unplanned stay.
Went in in the evening, found the staff pleasanrt however, the price - 6000++ adding to 7200/night was definitely on the high side. The room was a suite, spacious with separate areas for dining, kitchenette, lounging and two beds. Definitely comfortable.
I missed out on the hotel's amenities like spa and restaurants, but had a relaxed night.
If you want to check out the neighbouring areas, there is plenty to see and do, though a bit on the rough end. The mall in the hotel building was a disappointment.
Was it good ? Yes. Was it worth the tariff ? No. The rate should have been at least a thousand less.
Else, it was a decent experience.

It's very good where we can stay very peacefully and very clean staffs are very
kind and very polite and the hotel is very good location outer part of hotel look bit crowded but it's ok when you are inside so no reason to say no for this hotel and also its budget friendly

the ambiance, privacy and service provided by the hotel is nice. The staff were friendly and helpful. Hope they would continue the same further. It would be nice if maintenance people were bit attentive and careful.

Though I landed in Sarovar by chance, but it was a pleasant one. Like the hospitality, the room is just awesome. The food buffet is very reasonable and has got a good spread. I just had one night to stay there and this is a disappointment. Will surely be there the next time I visit Bangalore.

The only bad thing is that the access to it. The rooms have two TVs but they are small considering the size of the room.

If you are looking for a nice stay in Bangalore, this is the destination. Its on the Hosur road and thus the accessibility also is not a problem.

Spacious, Luxurious, Clean and well maintained. Courteous and helpful staff. Elaborate breakfast menu. Good variety in IN Room service and decently priced. Refrigerator stocked with good variety. Free wifi. Enough channels in cable TV. Enjoyed the stay, never needed to contact anyone for any issues during my 3 day stay.

The hotel was fantastic. The location may be a problem for few as there isnt much nearby and the location itself is near some market, but once you are inside the hotel, it is marvellous.
The food options were also good and had variety on different days.

It was a pleasant experience in my 4 day stay at the hotel. Rooms were big and clean with English TV channels. Wifi was provided for free as a value added service. Food was excellent. Importantly, hotel staff were friendly, helpful and accommodating. Excellent!

Stayed for 5 days. The room / suite was very good, well kept. The view was poor. The food was good. Limited spread. Good courteous staff at places, would recommend the place even if the location is a little inconvenient on the traffic packed madivala road. The only negative was the adamant front desk staff that refused complimentary breakfast on the (morning) day of check-in citing rules, despite me telling them that i wouldnt be having it the next few days in morning.

I was there for 2 days with my friends. It was very comfortable stay. Seeing hotel from outside one can not believe the quality but once you enter inside you can really feel the difference and fell the warmth.

Food was great and services were awsome.

Will visit again whenever traveling to Bangalore.

Location is very convenient and it is very nice property to stay,big rooms and overall very good experience.Good service and very good breakfast,nice placeto stay and good customer service.convenient to reach.

Davanam Sarovar, Kormangla a fantastic business hotel, very spacious room, friendly and efficient staff and more over lavish buffet breakfast with number of options to choose and enhance your taste buds.

Excellent service by the staff. Amazing ambience overall an awesome stay with my family. Food is awesome and complimentary breakfast is too good lot of varieties to taste.Centre place in kormangala and also near by to other places in bangalore.
Awesome stay...

Hotel is located near Koramangala, which is no doubt a happening place. There is a mall adjacent to the hotel building where you can find mcd, kfc . Den services offered by hotel were commendable .room was a suit room . They provide you with induction and microwave also . If u want to cook and eat . Overall I recommend this place . Amazing place to stay in Bangalore

Service and facility all so nice.
I was amazed open the room door, room,because floor is so big.
It may be an improper expression, noisy klaxon sound struck my ear from outside.
But that wouldn't be much of a problem.

Rooms are very spacious and comfortable. Very good hospitality. Value for money. Food is excellent. The only concern my room is far away from the elevator. Lavish Buffet breakfast. Definitely I recommend to all my friends who visit bangalore.

It seems the Hotel is not managed by the Sarovar group as the quality was really poor
Less Food Option
Breakfast Buffet not upto the Mark
Gym Equipments are also Poor
Pool not functioning
Rooms are not Noise Proof - You get the Traffic Sound Whole Night

I stayed in this hotel the second time so no doubt I went back there as I liked the Hotel. The location is bad due to it being right at the end of market area however once you enter the hotel you forget it. Very nicely done and a good property with modern facilities. Tasty food and a nice buffet spread.

I had checked into this hotel to celebrate my mother's birthday and this property was a complete pleasant surprise for me. I have lived in Bangalore before and have seen this place in the middle of a crazy junction next to a mall, but never thought this place would be this great

Considering I was checking in with my parents, the front office upgraded us to a bigger room. The suites are extremely large, with great moving space across the rooms. The bedroom was a bit cramped, especially the space between the window and the bed, but otherwise it was ok. The bathrooms felt like being in a super luxury suite

We also managed to have one meal (lunch) and breakfast and it was completely worth it. Something unique about their breakfast was that the food tasted like home cooked ones

I stayed at this place with my family and i must say we all were very happy with the overall stay. Nice spacious rooms, a big enough living room, kitchenette and if you need anything the staff is always there with a smile to serve you.

I am a frequent traveler and I stay in many hotels of this group and I find Davanam Sarovar is best till date.
Buffet for lunch and dinner are good, but i feel they need to add some more options during breakfast.

Stayed in The Hotel for a day For during a Business Trip to Bangalore

1) Real Big , Well Furnished and Well Maintained Rooms .
2) Real Good Food , But Costly
3) Services are Really Good , No Comparison
4) Location is Also Good , Centrally Located
5) I got the Room at prices way less then the Published prices, So it was a Value for Money for Me

Book The Hotel Online or through a Agent , You would get real Good Discount

The executive suite that i was put up was outstanding, it had a living room, a fully functional kitchen and a bed room. The amenities included a 40 inch LCD both in the living room and bed room and a full size fridge in the kitchen. The linen was fresh and the toiletries were branded.

The complimentary breakfast was amazing, one of the best I had in recent times. The staff at the restaurant and reception were very courteous and serred me with a smile. Overall a great place to stay in Bangalore

I stayed at this hotel 3rd time and every time I get excellent service. Staff is great, many healthy varieties in breakfast, they have small but very nice gym too. Dinner options are great and staff is always willing and standby to please the customer. Rooms are vary spacious, nice, and clean. I would certainly recommend this place and location is great too. They have small mall right next to the hotel, so if you can go for indoor walk and get a bite of local delicacy or western food.

Only thing they I didn't like was their internet connection - it was slow at times and down couple times during my stay. So, I hope they fix it for good.

Located adjacent to a Mall with great rooms.

You practically feel at home at this place - huge space with large living area with open kitchen. Separate bed area with wardrobe space and bath. A good study table and chair. One has quite a walk going from one room to another.

Their staff is amazing -- great service attitude at checkin, on housekeeping, for any technical internet help to the restaurant and everyone makes you feel welcome and takes special care.

Breakfast spread is awesome with fresh juices, fresh parathas, waffles in addition to a massive spread of Indian, Continental and Japanese items (probably they must be hosting Japanese tourists and travellers - have not seen this in other Bangalore hotels). The buffet is worth a try as well - might end up on borderline gluttony due to the huge spread and the fact that staff takes special care of hotel guests eating at the buffet.

Sleep quality is good - nice pillow selection and a conveniently placed television in front of the bed. This one is smaller TV compared to big size television in living area. With two separate thermostats - cooling the room is not an issue.

Kitchen is good - they usually place a microwave and you can ask front desk for an induction cooker and other utensils if you need to cook.

On the improvement front - I would say that lighting needs to be brighter and also internet speeds have gone down lately. Used to fast earlier and now its jittery that affect business related work like conference calls. Both I think could be easily solved to make it an even greater experience.

Overall great place - will stay again - best value for money hotel.

There are too many good things to write about this hotel. The location is great - close to Total Store, Forum Mall and a number of great restaurants. We stayed in this hotel for 2 days and through our stay, we kept admiring this hotel for something or the other. The staff - right from front desk to Room service to restaurant - is class apart! We wanted to heat up milk for our baby and the room service provided us a brand new microwave and an induction cooktop in no time. During the conversation, they got to know it was my birthday the next day. Everyone from room service gave me a big surprise and brought flowers and a yummilicious cake on my b'day. They made the day even more special. The rooms are another big plus - they are very spacious and neatly maintained. You feel as if you are living in a spacious one bedroom apartment with a walk in. It does not stop here. Coming to food, the hotel restaurant serves amazing food. Their lunch and dinner buffet both are delicious. The spread is not that great but everything tasted great. There were so many starters that you will not even feel like going for main course - and all of them were good. Fish tikka, honey glazed crispy veggies, noodles, potato tikki and chana dal halwa - to name a few - tasted so delicious - everyone must eat in their restaurants while staying at the hotel. Total value for money. This hotel truly deserves to be in the list of highly rated hotels in the city - worth every penny!

Last month, we planned a South India tour. Therefore, for a week we stayed in the garden city. My niece, who is in Bangalore, booked rooms for our stay at Davanam Sarovar,Madivala. The hotel rooms are very large; I was really astonished when I saw the size of the rooms were so lucrative for the charges I paid. Being a North Indian family, we enjoyed the delicious North Indian food and to our surprise we came to know that the hotel is best at its Japanese cuisines.We had full Japanese meals, but felt the cuisines were so awesome.We definitely loved our stay here.

In avery good location. Hotel offers extreme luxurious rooms. Breakfast is great and services is awesome. Rooms are the USP. If you are looking for luxury in budget, It's a win win situation to opt for this hotel.

I have stayed at this hotel for around 15 days in 3 stints over July and August. First and foremost great rooms..big size good layout well equipped and well maintained. ..really comfortable. But that actually is not the best part of the hotel...I travel around a lot a spend good amount of time in different hotels...and the staff of this hotel will surely rank in the top 3...real great staff courteous helpful and the best part engaging...they really connect with their guests...
Location is great depending on where you have to travel in Bangalore.
The food is above average...decent selection but gets boring after some time...may be because I stayed for 15 days ...
One thing I found which was unusual and not sure if the hotel would like me pointing it here..the rack rates and the negotiated rack rates for an individual is always higher than make my trip which is what I use..the hotel was not ready to match. ..at a professional level I appreciate their stand...personal level not sure I like it...but no complaints I booked on make my trip...

On the whole would recommend this hotel. .especially if you have work in South Bangalore

Location wise it's very near to koramangala and got best connectivity.
Staff always courteous and greeting you with smile.
Rooms are ultra spacious suites and very comfortable bed.Two Tv's, fridge it's was like living in 1 BHK luxiourious apartment.
You can check Total Mall and it has KFC & MCD and ofcourse nightlife in koramangala amazing.
Breakfast got good variety and staff always willing to help and take best attention of you.
Check-in and check-out was smooth, Wifi(free) was super speed as we connected 3 devices.

Overall recommend for both leisure & business travellers for thier BEST & QUALITY Service.

We stayed here from 23rd August till 25th August. Property can be spotted just opposite to Madiwala police station. To my surprise the reception was @ 4th floor.
We had a smooth check-in. We had some issues in the 1st room allotted. But when raised an issue they changed our room.
The room service was prompt and good. The food was also nice . Breakfast had sufficient options and good staff around to help you in the restaurant

Nice and good place to stay. Highly recomended

I've stayed many times at this hotel. I used to rate it highly. But not any more.

On the positive side, the rooms are big and the staff really does try to help. In particular the housekeeping folks.

That said, I will no longer recommend this place. For over 18 months they have been advertising pool and gym. But as of August 2015 it is still not functioning.

The room-service food is as inconsistent as can be. Order the same dish two days in a row and the dish will be prepared in two different ways.

Wifi service provider is seemingly changed regularly. But during my recent 5 day stay the wifi was incredibly unstable.

To add insult to injury, it seems that management don't really know how to price the accommodation and other services properly. Now they charge an exorbitant amount for airport pickup. And that in a mediocre vehicle.

I won't be staying here again if I can help it.

I visited this place with my girl friend - we were there for 2 days. The hotel is easily accessible and is just on the Hosur Road next to Total mall. Very nice reception with a warm and pleasant welcome, check in was done in no time. Passages and surroundings were very quiet and the room was the perfect. I was in an Executive suite, everything one could look for was in place - 2 LCDs in perfectly positioned locations. Several relaxing options re sofa and chairs. A very comfortable bed to accommodate 2 people. Properly furnished. Very spacious bathroom. A minibar in place with the option of coffee making and cooking too on request basis. House keeping very prompt and room dining options throughout the clock. Additional facilities were gym, roof top pool and restaurant inside. For us breakfast was complimentary with a wide variety of cuisines. Very quiet and pleasant atmosphere prevailed. Privacy ensured. I would sum up by saying - state of art infrastructure and value for money; everything worth the price.

I stayed for 5 nights in Davanam Sarovar hotel and enjoyed every second of my stay. All the staffs were very helpful and gave the feeling that they are truly willing to know your needs.
There are numerous possibilities for food from Indian, Japanese, and Chinese cuisines.It has a lovely tea house and nice shops with unique and quality goods. The breakfast was truly a heavenly feeling. The view from the room was awesome and the smell of fresh flowers that came into the room felt refreshing.

This hotel is in true sense a perfect place to stay. Such friendly and helpful staff. Amazing food. And a large buffet spread. The staff is extremely prompt and they go to a great extent to fulfill the needs of their guests. Extremely cordial and they wish you at all times. Very clean and spacious rooms.

Rooms are great..looking at entrance one can't even imagine that this hotel will have such big rooms. The best part is all are suite rooms only.

Location of hotel is also ok about 5-6 kms from city centre.

In a nutshell

Food is good
Rooms are very spacious and have luxury feel
Service is good
Location is ok
Amenities are good

Thanks,

Ankit

Ideal place to stay if you have work around koromongla. Nice spacious rooms, good food. Decent spread for buffet breakfast. Rooms are very clean and we'll maintained - all rooms are suite types only. Service is also pretty prompt

This place is absolutely awesome. Loved my stay here. The stay was very comfortable. Service was prompt. Amazing hospitality. Good quality food. Everything about the place was perfect for a business trip. Starting from location to services. Was an amazing experience. My girl friend is totally in love with this place, and wants to stay here every time we visit bangalore.

This is one of the coolest places for travelers to stay in Bangalore. Davanam Sarovar Portico Suites is situated in Madivala, which is very close to major areas of the city. The area is well spread out. The hotel has a contemporary natural feel with windows all around. Bathrooms were very clean and functional. The dining menu offers a good and interesting choice.

Quality of food is like home cooking. Rooms are luxurious and classical. We have only beautiful memory of this restaurant. I am so pleased to have enjoyed our first visit and we look forward to visit Davanam Sarovar again.

The property is amazing. The suites are really big, well designed and maintained. The staff is very helpful. The checkin and check out was absolutely smooth and quick. The food was great. Overall excellent and worth the money you pay.

this hotel is attached to a mall. So if you checking in request a room NOT facing the inside of the mall as it is depressing. location is good if you wanna be in Koramangala. the hotel starts on the 4th floor.
check in was smooth. wifi free for 2 devices only. my room was facing the inside of the mall (room 604)
the room I had was big. with a kitchenette, living room, dressing area, work area and 2 single beds. there were 2 TV's in the room. Clean, tidy. there were some spots on the bed sheet which could be clean. Bed were comfortable. Wifi is good in the room but the cell phone reception was poor
the bathroom is good but toiletries are poor in quality and quantity.
The restaurants has a Japanese menu. The veg sushi platter was good but the so called Udon noodles were bad. I think the chef need to understand what is Udon noodles What I got was flat noodles. Breakfast was good. good variety and taste.
I called the hotel and asked if there was a travel desk and was told there was. When I ask them at the reception, I was told they would help me. I wanted a taxi for the next day. The next day I has to wait for 10 min even though I had confirmed. the driver has no road sense. Thanks to google maps I made it to the destination and airport.
Check out was smooth.

Had stayed in many 4 and 5 star hotels, even though this hotel is in a shopping mall, the locality seems okay, hospitality was good, food and dinning were perfect, very good staffing and worth for the money you pay.

Have stayed in many hotels during my visit to Bangalore. But none of the experience was as good as davanam! The service, room, food, friendly staff, everything was just excellent. Have stayed here 2-3 times and from now on I don't need to think about any other hotel. This will always be my first choice. Besides all the excellent facilities their location is also very good, its next to total mall with has shopping,food joints and parlor and near to companies. Everything is just perfect about this hotel, would highly recommend everyone to choose this and I assure you won't regret staying here!

One of the finest property I have ever stayed. Will love to stay again. Awesome staff and fabulous food.

Heads off to Mr. Prashant Nair he is a true professional he is a gem as he helped me in booking my room keeping my budget in mind and made sure services are at par. Hat's off to management for recruiting true professional's.

Will make sure I stay at this property whenever I visit Bangalore.

Cheers keep up the good work!!!

It was a very cool stay at this hotel, spacious suits, well designed interiors, courteous staff, extremely good breakfast, excellent room service, surprisingly good north Indian food, free wi-fi was also fast, of course will remember the take-away breakfast they provided when we checked out early at 5:30 AM, will look forward to stay again here.

I was amaze to find well spacious room with lot of amenities, this is one of my best stays in Bangalore. Rooms consists of nice bed, couches, study tables, even a modular kitchen and what not. A perfect stay in home away from home.
They served nice complimentary breakfast too. All in very affordable prices

The hotel has very good breakfast and living environment. There is big kitchen in the room, so can make some food by self. Also itâ€™s very convenient for shopping, as there is shopping mall and supper market under the hotel. Good!
A suggestion for improvement is that the pillow is not comfortable for sleep. One pillow is a little low for sleep but two pillows are too high. Better quality pillows may be better.

The hotel is situated in the very entrance of Bangalore. Simply amazing. The suite rooms are extraordinary and simply incomparable.Best suite in Bangalore. Food was buffet and was extremely good. Must place to stay in bangalore.

Since the hotel is ideally located in Madiwala, there is no trouble to travel toward Indiranagar or Kormangala. It has amazing and friendly staff and I just loved the food available here. I tried Japanese cuisine at Tangerine many times during my stay.

Good place to stay, if youâ€™ve work in the central locations. It has excellent front office and warm reception along with well-equipped rooms. Iâ€™m really impressed with the cleanliness and there wasnâ€™t much trouble in check in/check out periods. Would love to visit again!

this is my second experience with sarovar brand and the stay was good this time too. the hotel offers spacious, well furnished suites, good for business/leisure stays. room service and food at tangerine restaurant also were good. the location is convenient for those coming from chennai side who stop for transit (without entering the city) and want to proceed to mysore/coorg. There is a shopping mall adjacent to the hotel - so its a busy neighbourhood and parking is a shared one with the mall, which is slightly inconvenient.

Met my requirements during my stay. Can improve on the Quality of Toiletries and Provide all the toiletries in the room for the Travelers. Lighting in the room can be better as its dark at some places I particular in the dressing area.

Stayed overnight during recent business trip, Room was very spacious, Very Good service, Breakfast was good. Staffs were very friendly. Hotel is located next to Total Mall. Wi-fi was excellent. booked through a travel website but hassle free check in & check out. Value for money.

I got to stay at Davanam Sarovar Portico Suites for 1 month. The stay was good. There was a small pool and gym as well. The hotel staff was very cooperative and helpful. They treat guests really well.

The food was great with the buffet spread providing a lot of varieties and the taste was awesome. The ambience was equally good.

Worth staying!

I recently visited Davanam Sarovar Portico Koramangala Bangalore and stayed there during my trip. It is a nice business hotel and excellent choice to stay. The facilities in the hotel are pretty good and the breakfast buffet was great.

It was a very good experience and service was really excellent. Rooms are very spacious and each suite is completely luxurious. You can enjoy wi-fi connectivity everywhere in the hotel and drink lovers can visit Tangerine mini bar where you will get all international brands.

I would certainly opt to stay here during all my subsequent visits.

Spacious accomodation, like staying at home.
Good space management with clear access
Interior & furnishing of standard++ quality
Housekeeping in line with 5*
Complete comfort
Food quality good, hygenine & nutrition value taken care

The hotel rooms, staff and overall facilities are quite good. The rooms are well maintained and has good Wifi and TV screens. The staff is very responsive and room service is quite prompt. The food options are also quite adequate for a family.

Stayed here overnight during recent business trip, Spacious room, good service, excellent breakfast. Staff is also very friendly. Value for money.

Place is next to a mall. Very convenient for family/holiday travel.

Stay in a mall facing room so that road noise can be avoided

This was my second stay at the hotel and boy I was glad I stayed here AGAIN. The hotel had already met all my expectations in my first trip. Food, Services, Big Room, Well Maintained, Free WIFI (not a big deal) and so on. Everything is great about this hotel.
Second trip, I had same expectations but they met all of it.
I highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying around this location (Whitefield, Hosur Road, Madiwala, Koramangalam)...

ATB,
Manish

This is my best stay till date.I'm a solo traveller from Australia.Really liked the place and it's cheaper and worth of the price for this class in Bangalore.
Except for the noise from housekeeping in the lobby and no window in rooms everything else is perfect.Heaven on earth is Davanam!

Fantastic stay. Very warm welcome, excellent staff, great food, prompt service. The rooms are great - very spacious and modern. The WiFi connection was good as well. The buffet spread at dinner was great and food was very nice. Check in and check out was convenient and fast paced. Really enjoyed my stay here and will definitely come back here...

I stayed in the premium suite, which was exactly like as seen in pictures. With all the luxury, the room had a great view of Electronic City flyover. The hotel is very clean and hygienic. And the staff is also very prompt and helpful. From outside though the hotel doesn't look very fancy,but their suits are THE BEST in the city. I had a great time there. will definitely visit again.

I am from Bhubaneswar and my friend gifted me a 2 nightâ€™s stay with my husband at this wonderful hotel on the occasion of our anniversary. We stayed in their premium suite, which was like a palace room of 21st century with all the luxury. The view from the window was great, especially at night that showed the Electronic City highway lighted beautifully in dark.
The hotel is very particular about cleanliness and hygiene and we were awed with the staffâ€™s prompt response and assistance to plan our short trip in Bangalore. You may get luxury in other 5-star hotels as well, but the staffâ€™s behavior in taking additional charge to ensure our two days short trip went on well not just inside the hotel but outside too. This compelled us to write about the great hospitality of the staff at Davanam Sarovar Portico Suites.

I was on a business trip to Bangalore and stayed at Davanam, but had also taken along my family so that the trip could double up as a vacation. I spent time with my family exploring the city during the evenings. The hotel team was very helpful and assisted my family members during my absence with their needs.
They even helped me plan my trip in the city, giving me suggestions and helping me book cabs for the tour. The in-house Tangerine restaurant catered to our food and snack needs- I should admit the food was really delicious. All of us had a very pleasant stay at the hotel and received the best service.

I have never got to stay in Davanam Sarovar hotel, but I got a chance to be present there as a guest for a business conference held at the newly opened Hyde Park. I felt that it was a pretty good place for business meets and conferences. The venue is big enough for more than 100 people and they serve the best breakfast and lunch at their in-house Tangerine restaurant. Being a vegetarian, I got so many options to satisfy my hunger with delicious starters, main course, and dessert as well.
The staffs were pretty good in handling and arranging the things that we wanted.

I am from Mumbai and went to Bangalore for a pleasure trip. I stayed at Davanam Sarovar and must say it was a home away from home.
It is located at the heart of Bangalore, so travelling to different places was not a problem. Thereâ€™s a mall next to Davanam, which is an added USP for the hotel. The staff here is very helpful. The food is also awesome at their in-house restaurant. I will give it 4.5 out of 5.

Great Business Hotel
Davanam Sarovar is an excellent hotel, centrally located in Madivala, Bangalore. During my previous visit to the city, I had booked a room at this hotel after reading some good reviews about the place and my experience at the hotel certainly lived up to my expectations after going through the reviews.
Right from my check-in to check-out, my whole stay was absolutely cool. The staffs were very professional and helpful, catering to all my needs. The room was also very comfortable and good, offering all the required amenities. A thumbs-up for the great hospitality the whole team is offering! Keep up the good work!

Over all the stay was comfortable, the rooms neat & tidy. Accessible with shopping mall annexes & good food with hospitality.
Was true value for money and suggest that it be recommended to friends & kins as well.

Its a good hotel for stay!! Its located near shopping and public places. One can enjoy the service of the hotel. It is bit expensive. Food was good. The rooms are spacious. The garden is small outside.

I have really enjoyed all my stays at this property till date. All the rooms are suits with a bedroom, drawing room and a small kitchenet - which is great for longer stays. The spread in their breakfast & dinner buffets are pretty decent. We also got free wifi with good speed. Although, the housekeeping service leaves a little to be desired, this is a great option, especially for longer stays

room for improvement:

Perfectly royal - is the most appropriate word for this luxury hotel. We had come over to Bangalore to spent our honeymoon And had a stop over at Sarovar portico for a night. The room was unbelievably spacious and comfortable. It was a studio apartment sort of setup. It had a kitchen area with a fridge, coffee maker in it. It had a small study area and a pretty decent walk in closet too. The service was good. And to add up to it the food was excellent. The complementary breakfast was really amazing. Although a executive hotel but we as a couple found it very exciting. We simply enjoyed our stay over here.
Will really love to visit again.

excellent hotel, the decor is great, wifi is great, food was amazing. It is on the expensive side.

The traffic outside the hotel is a let down, but this is expected in bangalore. the Swimming pool was amazing

I had stayed with my wife and a child for 25 days, we had a great stay we were there for NAET treatment , we were well looked after our needs or any other suggestions we needed. Breakfast was great and the staff was very much attentive. We were provided with induction top for cooking some items for our child as there was kitchenette in the suites. Mr Prasant Nair is a great and very much helpful person. We had not booked for 1day in between due to non availability. Hotel was completely full but we were given priority for the reservation and the stay was managed by him for us. We would surely stay again.

I stayed in this hotel for 3 days and my stay was really comfortable. The entire team is very polite and are ready to help you and make your stay comfortable! I am extremely satisfied with the hotel and will surely recommend this to everyone who is looking for a GOOD accommodation in Bangalore.

The hotel is like amazing. The rooms are so spacious, so clean, all the amenities are like a 5star. Bathrooms were exotic, and the staff had taken care of the hygiene so well. When we visited the swimming pool was not there, it was under construction. The breakfast was yummy, up to the mark. I am a satisfied guest.

Good option to stay in Koramangla. Nice location . vey comfortable , clean and equipped rooms.....................................................................

Adjoining a superstore , KFC , Mc D ,..........

I came to India for the fifth time and this was my most enjoyable and satisfied trip. The credit goes to Davanam Portico Suites. This hotel has amazing service with large spacious rooms, decent food, good ambience and excellent connectivity to all good places in Bangalore. The swimming pool is well maintained and my kids enjoyed a lot. We went to Barleys that is just near the hotel. The hotel staff assisted us with booking cabs for our trip. With beautiful interiors, the hotel has a restaurant named Tangerine. I can simply say that my visit was the best this time.

Checked in this hotel on 24.05.16 at 18hrs in evening. Had gone thru TRIPADVISOR'S re view's thoughrly and went for it .As the drive from the Airport to the hotel. is 45 km it took us 90 minutes to reach the hotel. Our executive suite 600sq feet Approximately is one of the biggest in the hotel history considering that it was mere 80 dollars or rs 5000.00 per nite for a triple occupancy on CP plan. Our check in was super express in room no 630. The room decors, ambions, partition of the room with a master bed room, separate kitchen and a separate living room with the best of air conditioning reminded me Oberoi Grand Kolkata (I still believe in air conditioning part, no one can beat Oberoi group). This property comes closest to it. Excellent room/ suite whatever u call it. Ordered for veg snacks like pakoda and Masala tea at 7 PM. Till 7.30 no response!. Reminded the room service who told that in 5 minutes it win reach my room. He conveyed his sincere apologies and promised to rectify in no time. With in two minutes my food arrived hot and packed beautifully. As I asked for the bill I was informed that it was COMPLIMENTARY as a gesture of goodwill. We had our tea and snacks very good in taste and very well prepared. The F& B Dept. Called us separately and requested us to forgive and forget.Promised that for my entire stay they will deliver room service food within 20 minutes. I think the ever helpful duty manager (A true Professional) update all the departments under him to give us Spl. Attn. Ok. Now for the room menu. Quite pocket friendly like veg curries were priced at an average of RS 250.00 per plate. In Kolkata Sarovar property the average charge is RS 550.00 per plate. We had a sound sleep after dinner.
